titleStmt.title: Certaine frivolous obiections against the government of the Church of England answeared by John Jewel ...
titleStmt.author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.

notesStmt.note: Running title: Bishop Iewels defence of the churches governement.
Reprinted from Whitgift's Answere to a certen libel, in which it first appeared. Cf. Parker Society edition of the works of John Jewel. 1850. v. 4, p. [1299]
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
